response.overview: Ultra Endurance cyclists push themselves to the limit. Attempting their Fastest Known Times can be the ultimate test of physical and mental fortitude.  Riders cover vast distances across day and night in all out battle against the clock to establish a new FKT.  GCN+ follows the Alaskan born Lael Wilcox, one of the worlds toughest bikepack racerâ€™s, as she traverses the state of Oregon, tackling the remote outback route on America's East coast in an attempt to set a new Fastest Known Time. In the self supported effort which crosses the mountainous state, Lael will need to ride non stop covering 586KM in under 27hours 27minutes across some of America's most challenging gravel terrain. We learn about Laels spirited and vibrant approach to bike pack exploration within the dynamic landscapes of volcanic mountains, high desert terrain, and arid shrubland as we watch in awe as she takes on this superhuman effort.
response.title: Lael Wilcox - Fastest Known Time (FKT)
